name: Geisterjaeger
description:
Geisterjäger

As you approach the old hounted castle while wandering around the forest, you see ghosts dancing around the walls. When they face you, ghosts and other
spooky folk want you to go away and leave them alone. Can you bring the m back
into their castle so that you can follow along your way?

Idea

Hunt down the ghosts that come from the castle
http://www.gamebase64.com/game.php?id=10976&d=36&h=0
http://www.gamebase64.com/game.php?id=24954&d=36&h=0

Controls

To move, use left/right arrow keys
Shooting is done by pressing SPACE

URL

https://fuzzyfox.itch.io/geisterjaeger

Release notes

0.3.0 - Graphic improvements and first wave-based level increase

0.2.0 - Updated some code and added first graphics

0.1.0 - Initial release with first playable content and mechanics
